level.description: You now have access to the <color=#ff0000ff>BREAKPOINTER</color> tool. It can enable <color=#ff0000ff>breakpoints</color> that can check the program state. Set a <color=#ff0000ff>BREAKPOINT</color> where you notice the faded "B", then <color=#ffff00ff>PRINT</color> it. Use a BUGCATCHER once you know where the bug is.
level.introtext: One last tool to learn: the <color=#ff0000ff>BREAKPOINTER</color> tool. It can give more detailed feedback about variables. Combine it with the <color=#ffff00ff>ACTIVATOR</color> tool!
level.endtext: Now you should try to use Breakpoints!
